ðŸ“– Summary: Dicio is a free and open-source voice assistant for Android that operates on-device for privacy. It supports multiple languages and skills, providing both speech and graphical feedback. It utilizes Vosk for speech-to-text and offers various functionalities like searching, weather updates, lyrics, app opening, calculations, contact management, timers, time queries, navigation, and media control.
